DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study evaluate pharmacokinetic profile single dose IVIb administer 5-7 minute .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetic Study Of Ibuprofen Injection ( IVIb ) In Healthy Adult Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer age 18 65 year ( time consent ) . Participants lack good venous access arm . History allergy hypersensitivity NSAIDs component intravenous ibuprofen . Have never take aspirin ibuprofen History abuse alcohol drug 2 month CTM administration . Have use prescription drug ( include oral contraceptive ) within 14 day CTM administration use aspirin within one week CTM administration overthecounter pain reliever ( NSAIDs acetaminophen ) within 3 day CTM administration . Have take investigational drug within 30 day CTM administration . Have donate blood blood product within 30 day CTM administration . Be pregnant nursing . Have breast cancer . Have clinically significant laboratory test Presence history follow condition : asthma , bleed tendency , hypertension , heart failure , peptic ulcer disease , inflammatory bowel disease , gastrointestinal disorder , renal hepatic disease.. Have calculate creatinine clearance ( estimate mean CockcroftGault equation ) < 75mL/min Inability understand requirement study . Participants must willing provide write informed consent ( evidenced signature inform consent document approve Institutional Review Board [ IRB ] ) , agree abide study restriction . Refusal provide write authorization use disclosure protect health information Be otherwise unsuitable study , opinion Investigator .
